'''Divine Attainment''' is [[Shenhe]]'s Level 5 [[Constellation]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*{{Lang|1=''Huà Shén''|zh=化神}} is short for {{Lang|1=''Liànqì-Huàshén''|zh=炼气化神|zh_tl=Training Qi (natural energy of the universe) into Shen (original spirit of the body)}}, which refers to a physical, mental, and spiritual practice in Taoist {{w|Neidan}}.
